item.name: CCTs

response.name: Example
response.body:
[
    {
        "_ID": "7",
        "cct_status": "publish",
        "indication": "MDD",
        "fda_indication": "Desvenlafaxine is indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults. It is a serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI) that works by increasing the levels of serotonin and norepinephrine in the brain, which helps to improve mood and alleviate symptoms of depression. Desvenlafaxine is also sometimes used off-label for the treatment of anxiety disorders and other psychiatric conditions.",
        "cct_author_id": "1",
        "cct_created": "2023-05-31 18:39:22",
        "cct_modified": "2023-05-31 18:39:22",
        "cct_slug": "indications"
    }
]

url.raw: http://localhost/wordpress/index.php/wp-json/jet-cct/indications?indication=MDD&fda_indication=Desvenlafaxine is indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults. It is a serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI) that works by increasing the levels of serotonin and norepinephrine in the brain, which helps to improve mood and alleviate symptoms of depression. Desvenlafaxine is also sometimes used off-label for the treatment of anxiety disorders and other psychiatric conditions.

query.value: Desvenlafaxine is indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults. It is a serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI) that works by increasing the levels of serotonin and norepinephrine in the brain, which helps to improve mood and alleviate symptoms of depression. Desvenlafaxine is also sometimes used off-label for the treatment of anxiety disorders and other psychiatric conditions.

item.description:
These endpoints connect to JetEngine's Custom Content Types.

- Conditions
- Indications
- Drugs
    

The relationships between these content types are defined in the following folders.

- Condition -> Drug
- Drug -> Indications
    

See their folders for more details.

item.name: Conditions treated by a drug (parent relationship)

query.description: context - 'child' means we updating children items for static parent object, 'parent' means we updating parent items for static child object

replace/update, 'repalce' means if related object for given context already exists, it will be replaced with new one, 'update' means if related object for given context already exists, new related items will be added to already existsing (if allowed by relation settings).

request.description:
Where:

- context - 'child' means we updating children items for static parent object, 'parent' means we updating parent items for static child object
- store_items_type - 'repalce' means if related object for given context already exists, it will be replaced with new one, 'update' means if related object for given context already exists, new related items will be added to already existsing (if allowed by relation settings).
